parameters.description: A key-value map of query string parameters that specify properties of the SDK, depending on the requested sdkType. For sdkType of objectivec, a parameter named classPrefix is required. For sdkType of android, parameters named groupId, artifactId, artifactVersion, and invokerPackage are required.

restApiId.description: The identifier of the RestApi that the SDK will use.

sdkType.description: The language for the generated SDK. Currently javascript, android, and objectivec (for iOS) are supported.

stageName.description: The name of the Stage that the SDK will use.
